mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CC_COFFEE(SEQ, NAME, PRICE, NEWNAME, ORIGINNAME,INFO,ORDER_COUNT,KIND) VALUES(SEQ_COFFEE.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{price}, #{newname}, #{originname},#{info},0,#{kind} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CC_ORDER WHERE ODATE >= #{today} AND DEL < 1
SELECT ID, SEQ FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ) AS RNUM, ID, SEQ FROM CC_ORDER WHERE ODATE >= #{today} AND DEL < 1 ORDER BY SEQ ) WHERE #{start} <= RNUM AND RNUM <= #{end}
SELECT COFFEE_NAME , SHOT, SYRUP, ASK FROM CC_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE ORDER_SEQ = #{seq} ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CC_ALARM (SEQ, RECV_ID, SEND_ID, ORDER_SEQ,ADATE) VALUES(SEQ_ALARM.NEXTVAL,#{recv_id},#{send_id},#{order_seq},SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, NAME, PRICE FROM CC_COFFEE ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CC_SIDE(SEQ, NAME, PRICE) VALUES(SEQ_SIDE.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, NAME, PRICE FROM CC_SIDE ORDER BY SEQ DESC
